Effortlessly manage your workflow with Split Screen, the ultimate tool for traders, multitaskers, and productivity enthusiasts. Split your browser windows into 2, 4, or 6 perfectly arranged screens with just a click. Seamlessly work across multiple tabs, monitor charts, or manage tasks in parallel â€“ all from a single interface.

Key Features:

Smart Window Management: Automatically organize and split your screen across multiple monitors.
Multi-Monitor Support: Fully compatible with dual and multi-monitor setups.
Efficient URL Management: Copy existing tabs and distribute them across new windows.
User-Friendly Interface: An intuitive, stylish layout designed for enhanced productivity.
Perfect for day traders, coders, analysts, and anyone who needs to keep multiple tabs in view simultaneously. Boost your productivity and get more done with Split Screen!
